Package org.wmn4j.notation

Interface ConnectableBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraceNoteBuilder, NoteBuilder
public interface ConnectableBuilder
Represents builders that can be connected through Notation objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ConnectableBuilder
    connectWith(Notation notation, GraceNoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
    Connects this builder to the given grace note builder with the specified notation.
    ConnectableBuilder
    connectWith(Notation notation, NoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
    Connects this builder to the given note builder with the specified notation.

  • Method Details

    • connectWith

      ConnectableBuilder connectWith(Notation notation, NoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
      Connects this builder to the given note builder with the specified notation.

      The connections set using this method are automatically resolved and built when the note builder is built.

      Parameters:
      notation - the notation with which this is connected to the target
      targetNoteBuilder - the note builder to which this is connected using the given notation
      Returns:
      reference to this

    • connectWith

      ConnectableBuilder connectWith(Notation notation, GraceNoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
      Connects this builder to the given grace note builder with the specified notation.

      The connections set using this method are automatically resolved and built when the note builder is built.

      Parameters:
      notation - the notation with which this is connected to the target
      targetNoteBuilder - the grace note builder to which this is connected using the given notation
      Returns:
      reference to this
